com.kdkvit.wherewasi.sonitalk

Class SoniTalkSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kdkvit.wherewasi.sonitalk.SoniTalkSender

  • public class SoniTalkSender
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the sendjob and playing of the actual audiotrack.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • send

        public void send(@NonNull
                 SoniTalkMessage message,
                 int requestCode)
        Sends a SoniTalkMessage once. Should not be called when the state is already STATE_SENDING.
        Parameters:
        message -

      • send

        public void send(@NonNull
                 SoniTalkMessage message,
                 int nTimes,
                 long interval,
                 @NonNull
                 java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit,
                 int requestCode)
        Sends a SoniTalkMessage nTimes at a fixed delay. Should not be called when the state is already STATE_SENDING.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be sent (generated via SoniTalkEncoder)
        nTimes - the amount of times the message should be sent
        interval - delay between messages (fixed delay between the end of one message and the start of the next)
        timeUnit - the time unit of the interval parameter

      • cancel

        public boolean cancel()
        Cancels the current send job if there was one running.
        Returns:
        true when the state allowed to cancel.
